ERROR.EMAIL: No account exists for this email.

EULA.TITLE: MyBroodMinder.com EULA (End User License Agreement) v1.1
EULA.DESCRIPTION: We ask then you agree to the following statements to use this SaaS beekeeping software:
EULA.POINT_1: I am placing the data that I upload or enter into this service into the Public Domain. As such, mybroodminder.com may use the data, in anonymous form, to share with the general public.
EULA.POINT_2: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to not expose any Personally identifiable information (PII) such as my username, password, and zipcode, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for hacking or other methods of data exposure.
EULA.POINT_3: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to store and backup all data uploaded or entered into it, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for data loss.
EULA.POINT_4: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a separate company from other vendors that may integrate their devices into mybroodminder.com, and that mybroodminder.com is not liable for those vendors actions.
EULA.POINT_5: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a place for beekeepers and entomologists to exchange information, and I will conduct myself in a courteous manner at all times. I understand failing to do so may cause my account to be terminated at the sole digression of the staff of mybroodminder.com.

ERROR.DUPLICATE: The email address is already in use by another account.
ERROR.EMAIL: The email address is badly formatted.

RESOURCES.TITLE: Resources
RESOURCES.SUBTITLE: Here you will find many resources so that you can start contributing to learning more about our bees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for joining the BroodMinder movement where we are learning and sharing information in order to improve our understanding and management of our precious honeybees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION_2: Sincere thanks to Google and to WeatherSource.com for their generous support of BroodMinder Citizen Science.

APIARY_PAGE.PREMIUM_EXP: Time range selection for this view available with premium subscription.

TEXT.TITLE: Text
TEXT.DESCRIPTION: This view displays the most recent reading uploaded for every position in every hive.

HIVE.TITLE: Hive
HIVE.DESCRIPTION: This view displays a quick chart view for every hive. Weight display precedence: heaviest value. Humidity and temperature display precedence: 1-Above Lower Brood Box 2-Above Upper Brood Box 3-Under Inner Cover 4-Other 5-Custom (highest value) 6-Outside Hive 7-Scale Under Hive

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: This view displays combined charts by data type. Specifics shown follow the defaults of the hive view, but can be set per hive in the hive settings.
SUMMARY.PREMIUM_EXP: This view available with premium subscription. Example shown below.

PRODUCTIVITY.TITLE: Honeybee Productivity
PRODUCTIVITY.NONE: No weight data for honeybee productivity

HIVE_PAGE.DEVICE_WITH_DATA: Data in charts, currently in hive
HIVE_PAGE.DEVICE_NO_DATA: No data in charts, currently in hive
HIVE_PAGE.DEVICE_DATA_ONLY: Data in charts, not currently in hive
HIVE_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_PREMIUM: Downloading hive data available with premium subscription.
HIVE_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_WEATHER_PREMIUM: Downloading weather data available with premium subscription.

DEVICE_PAGE.TITLE: Device Data - {{name}}
DEVICE_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_PREMIUM: Downloading device data available with premium subscription.

EDITOR.TITLE: Outlier Editor
EDITOR.DESCRIPTION: Zoom chart or click point to filter readings below.
EDITOR.BUTTON_NONE: Select readings to remove in table below
EDITOR.NONE: No readings for this time period

CONFIRM_WINDOW.TITLE: Remove selected readings
CONFIRM_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Would you like to remove selected {{count}} readings?

OUTLIERS.TITLE: Readings marked as outliers
OUTLIERS.NONE: No removed readings for this time period
OUTLIERS.BUTTON_NONE: Select readings to add back as normal sensor readings

CONFIRM_WINDOW.TITLE: Move selected readings
CONFIRM_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Would you like to re-add selected {{count}} readings back to normal sensor readings?

NOTES.TITLE: {{value}} Notes

DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Delete note
DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Would you like to delete this note?

NOTES.PREMIUM_EXP: Downloading notes available with premium subscription.

CHANGE_TO.8: Swarm monitoring stopped by system, too busy.

DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Remove location
DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Would you like to remove this device location?

LOCATION_CRUD.MOVE_EXP: This ends current location and starts a new one.
LOCATION_CRUD.ERROR_DEVICE: Device has a location overlapping this time
LOCATION_CRUD.ERROR_HIVE: Hive has device overlapping this position
LOCATION_CRUD.ERROR_TIME: Location has end time before start time
LOCATION_CRUD.ERROR_INACTIVE_HIVE: Location cannot have end time after hive inactive time
LOCATION_CRUD.ERROR_MOVE_TIME: Cannot end location before start, set time to after {{currentEnd}}

EDIT.ERROR_INVALID_PREV_OVERLAP: Time invalid, overlaps previous apiary location
EDIT.ERROR_INVALID_NEXT_OVERLAP: Time invalid, overlaps next apiary location
EDIT.ERROR_LOCATION_REQUIRED: Hive requires at least one apiary
EDIT.ERROR_APIARY_REQUIRED: Must select an apiary for all locations

APIARY_CRUD.NAME: Name
APIARY_CRUD.EDIT_ZIP_EXP: You cannot change location for an apiary that contains data.
APIARY_CRUD.PRIVATE: Private (Do not share data) Premium Feature
APIARY_CRUD.PRIVATE_TOOLTIP: Please consider sharing your data. You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
APIARY_CRUD.NOT_PRIVATE_TOOLTIP: Thank you for sharing your data. You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.

EDIT_LOCATION.TITLE: Edit Apiary Location
EDIT_LOCATION.INFO: This location is used both to query weather and display your apiary to shared sites such as BeeCounted.org. This is disclosed with your public domain data and should not be the exact location of your apiary.
EDIT_LOCATION.POSTAL_ERROR: The coordinates you've selected are outside the apiary zipcode. This cannot be changed.

POSTAL_CHANGE.TITLE: Postal Code Change
POSTAL_CHANGE.TEXT: Would you like to change apiary to new postal code {{value}}?

WEIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Weight device to graph on the Apiary Summary
WEIGHT.NONE: Don't show a weight device on the Apiary Summary

TEMP.DESCRIPTION: Temperature device to graph on the Apiary Summar
TEMP.NONE: Don't show a temperature device on the Apiary Summary

HUMID.DESCRIPTION: Humidity device to graph on the Apiary Summary
HUMID.NONE: Don't show a humidity device on the Apiary Summary

BATTERY.DESCRIPTION: Battery device to graph on the Apiary Summary
BATTERY.AUTO: Show lowest Device battery in the Hive on the Apiary Summary?
BATTERY.NONE: Don't show a battery device on the Apiary Summary

MOVE.TITLE: Move Hive
MOVE.EXP: All data in this hive stays the same, but this will place the hive in the selected apiary from this date forward. This is reflected in weather data and apiary views.

DEVICE_CRUD.NAME: Name
DEVICE_CRUD.BIP_SEND: Send data to the Bee Informed Partnership
DEVICE_CRUD.ERROR_DUPLICATE: Could not create, device with that address already exists
DEVICE_CRUD.ERROR_BIP: Must agree to BIP Terms of Use to enable sending

ERROR.USED_THIS_ACCOUNT: Already confirmed for this account, expires on {{value}}

EDIT_EMAIL.TITLE: Change Account Email
EDIT_EMAIL.REFRESH_ERROR: Changing your account email requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this change.

PREFERENCES.INTERPOLATE: Interpolate Charts (connect all points, even if data gaps over 8 hours)

CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Delete Apiary
CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete apiary {{name}}? This permanantly deletes the apiary.

CANNOT_DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Cannot Delete Apiary
CANNOT_DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: This apiary contains the following hives: {{hives}} You cannot delete this apiary until you delete or move these hives.

CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.TITLE: Set Apiary as Inactive
CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: This sets all hives in this apiary as inactive, ends all device locations in each hive, and removes the apiary from your views. Existing data will remain, however new data will no longer go to this apiary or it's hives. This cannot be undone. Set apiary {{name}} to inactive?

CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Delete Hive
CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete hive {{name}}? This permanantly deletes the hive.

CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.TITLE: Set Hive as Inactive
CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: This ends all device locations in the hive and removes hive from your apiary views. Existing data will remain, however new data will no longer go to this hive. This cannot be undone. Set hive {{name}} to inactive?

CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.TITLE: Delete Device
CONFIRM_DELETE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete device {{deviceName}}? This permanantly deletes the device and it's associated data.

BEECOUNTED.TITLE: BeeCounted.org
BEECOUNTED.PRIVATE_APIARY: Hive data not shared with BeeCounted. This apiary, {{name}}, is not shared to BeeCounted.
BEECOUNTED.PRIVATE_HIVE: Hive data not shared with BeeCounted.

USER.TITLE: MyBroodMinder Users
USER.INFO: The user must already have an account with MyBroodMinder. They will be allowed to see your apiary and hive data, but not make any changes.

BEECOUNTED.INFO_CHECKED: Thank you for sharing your data. You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
BEECOUNTED.INFO_UNCHECKED: Please consider sharing your data. You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
BEECOUNTED.INFO_NON_PREMIUM: All data stored for non-premium users is public domain. Data may be made private if you have a MyBroodMinder-Premium account. Thank you for sharing your data. You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
